note.title: Location of the Credential Store database file
note.p: The path to the KeepPass database file that contains the credentials for access to the database.
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value in the URL with the ?file= query parameter.

note.title: Location of the Credential Store Key File
note.p: The path to the KeePass key file that represents the key for access to the credential store. This requires a key file to be assigned the KeePass database file. If no KeePass key file is specified, the the file name is assumed from the basename of the KeePass database file and the extension .key.
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value in the URL with ?keyfile= query parameter.

note.title: Path to entries in the Credential Store
note.p:
The argument is used to specify a common path that is added to all entries.
Example:
credential_store_entry_path=/sos/jobscheduler
password=cs://mydb@password
In the KeePass database the entry is found in /sos/jobscheduler/mydb@password.
Alternatively it is possible to specify the value in the URL with the ?entry_path= query parameter.
